Package com.forgerock.opendj.ldap.tools

Class LDAPPasswordModify

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.forgerock.opendj.cli.ConsoleApplication
      • com.forgerock.opendj.ldap.tools.LDAPPasswordModify
  • public final class LDAPPasswordModify
extends ConsoleApplication
    A tool that can be used to issue LDAP password modify extended requests to the Directory Server. It exposes the three primary options available for this operation, which are:
    • The user identity whose password should be changed.
    • The current password for the user.
    • The new password for the user.
    All of these are optional components that may be included or omitted from the request.

      • run

        public static int run​(PrintStream out,
                      PrintStream err,
                      String... args)
        This method should be used to run this ldap tool programmatically. Output and errors will be printed on provided PrintStream.

        err - The PrintStream to use to write tool errors.
